ComicInfo.Summary: The comic book for folks with their heads in the 1800s and their crotches in the 2000s struts boldly ahead with illustrated excerpts from the circa-1923 beekeeping manual "Queen Rearing Symplified." Learn everything you've always wanted to know about handling nasty fighting bees and bad, bad weather â€” but were afraid to ask! Also: the touching story of a girl who loves carpenters, goes koo-koo, and builds thousands of rooms onto her house so she can have somewhere to go. Sound neat-o? Wild? Spastic-manic-trance inducing? Then hop your butts on board, you silly goof-balls; there's Meat Cake in them thar hills!
